name: 2D to 3D Game Project
description:
An early prototype of a puzzle game in which the main mechanic is the ability to swap between a 2D and 3D perspective. This is a testbed of a variety of gameplay mechanics, such as an object that causes the player to automatically swap, two panels that can enable/disable swapping, and a panel that limits the number of swaps possible.

To swap, simply press the Space bar, and to sprint you can press Left Shift. To read signs, the default key is E. All of these are customizable.
